ModMetaData.name: Market Value Filter
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description: Market Value Filter Adds a 'market value' filter to stockpile and ingredient selectors. Inspired by Perishable Spoil Time Filter and it's 1.4 port. https://github.com/zed-0xff/RW-MarketValueFilter Support me https://ko-fi.com/K3K81Z3W5 or https://www.patreon.com/zed_0xff
